★ Limenex - High Performance Managed VPS ★ Pure SSD VPS Available! ★

Limenex.com - High Performance Managed VPS Hosting

Are you looking for an incredible web host or switching from your current host? Choosing the right hosting provider is extremely important. Frequent downtime, poor hardware, terrible network and terrible support are disastrous for any website. With the myriad of hosting companies to choose from, we know the decision is difficult. With Limenex, the choice is obvious. We give you everything you need and more to run your websites smoothly with an incredible support team available 24/7 to assist you.

Limenex Web Hosting is a company that cares for its customers. We strongly believe in delivering the best for our customers. Hence, we build all our servers with top-quality hardware coupled with plenty of innovative software to deliver a whole new high performance web hosting experience for you! With the addition of our knowledgeable staffs working behind the scenes, blazing fast loading speed, high uptime, incredible technical support and features-packed hosting service are some of the ways we keep our customers happy!

Reliable and dependable web hosting does not have to break the bank. Host with Limenex now and enjoy excellence at its finest. Switch to Limenex today and we will migrate your websites for free!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

★ Why Our Customers Love Us ★

  • Fully Managed Servers - Our experts are here 24/7 to manage your server for you. No Linux knowledge is needed to use our managed servers. You can focus on running your websites while we run the servers for you. Click here to learn more!
  • Incredible 24/7 Support - Our support is one of the best in the industry with industry leading response time of 15 minutes average. There's no need to wait for hours or days before somebody looks into your issue!
  • High Performance Servers - All our servers run enterprise-grade hardware and are optimised for optimum performance for our customers!
  • FREE Daily Backup - Your data's integrity is extremely important to us. We ensure this is enforced by performing daily backup on all VPS for FREE!
  • 99.9% Uptime - We don't just guarantee it, we deliver it or you get free service from us. It's that simple.
  • Trustable Business - Limenex has been around since 2010 and we are a legally registered business and we pay our taxes. We won't go missing overnight some "hosts" do.
View Our Servers: www.limenex.com/managed-vps-hosting.html

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

★ Hosting Features ★

  • Powered by Virtuozzo
  • FREE cPanel/WHM Control Panel
  • FREE Migration from Old Host
  • FREE Daily Backup
  • Full Root Access
  • CentOS 6.x Operating System
  • Dallas, Texas Data Centre
  • And many other features!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fully Managed VPS

All Limenex Virtual Private Servers (VPS) are fully managed for FREE. We will handle the technical details so that you can focus on running your websites without worrying about the geeky stuffs. Every managed VPS is secured and optimised before delivery so that you can start hosting your sites right after you receive the login email.
